info.description:
This is a collection of APIs to support Sports and Entertainment

The base endpoint URL for this API in production is: `https://marko.aramark.net/i1/se`.

For testing the API with the "Try" tool on this page or in your app, use either our testing server "qa-marko" or our development server "dev-marko".
info.title: Sports & Entertainment

apiKey.name: apikey
apiKey.description: This HTTP Header variable will verify permissions.

orgValueParam.name: org_value
orgValueParam.description: Aramark Organization Code for the dataset

startDateParam.name: start_date
startDateParam.description: Starting Date for the dataset YYYY-MM-DD format

endDateParam.name: end_date
endDateParam.description: Ending Date for the dataset YYYY-MM-DD format

bypassCacheParam.name: bypass-cache
bypassCacheParam.description: This HTTP Header variable will bypass cache.
